title: Prime Commercial Property for Sale
details:
This is a very large parcel of land located on a carpeted by road in Colombo 5 with easy access to Nugegoda Town, Kirulapone , Nawala/Nugegoda Road and New baseline Road.

The property comes with a 55 feet road frontage and this is ideally suits to build a n apartment complex or an office complex with more than 10 stories.

Land Extent :- 161 Perches

Quoted Selling Price :- LKR 4 Million Per Perch[Negotiable for a Quick Sale]

INQUIRIES WILL BE ENTERTAIN VIA EMAIL ONLY FROM SERIOUS CLIENTS.

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
